llmSegmentedChunks.chunkText: How is my info used? To: ● Manage bookings ● Contact you Internally, a temporary system email like wa_YOUR_NUMBER@skedy.ai is created.

Payments How do I pay? ● Cash is preferred. ● Transfers accepted when discussed beforehand. ● Some clients have paid after service, with trust. Deposits: ● 50% deposit required for bookings. ● Payment via: ○ +61 451 375 263 or 0404 278 733 ● Deposit refundable or transferable if cancelled 24 hours in advance.
Cancellations & No-shows ● Cancel or reschedule at least 24 hours in advance to keep deposit. ● Frequent late cancellations may lead to stricter policies.
